document.full_text: in-form novak djokovic will have the chance to regroup before his french open third-round match reconvenes on saturday after losing the second set against argentine juan martin del potro.
document.title: djokovic drops set as bad light stops play
lines_and_colors: in-form novak djokovic will have the chance to regroup before his french open third-round match reconvenes on saturday after losing the second set against argentine juan martin del potro.
